description.componentElement: The tag to use for this component.
description.size: The length of the divider. Either sm, md or lg.
description.title: Title to be displayed in the divider.
description.align: Alignment of text in the divider. left, center or right.
description.frame: If set to true, the title will be wrapped in a frame.
description.customFont: Enable if font color should be customized. Default: false
